head up.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to be in charge of an organization, part of an organization, or a group
head up.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Perkins left his post to head up marketing at Pizza Hut.
head up.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if a share price, currency etc heads up or is headed up, it increases in value
head up.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Commodity prices began heading up just after the recession ended.
